lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Heller said the effects of these actions "would be banks that are at least as strong as the corporations holding them" in which customer deposits were assured while any incentive to "loot the bank" was removed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a speech prepared for delivery in New York to the Bank and Financial Analysts' Association, Heller said, "I believe that increased diversification along geographic and product lines is the key to strengthening the American banking system."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Federal Reserve Board Governor Robert Heller said the banking system could be strengthened by permitting formation of financial services holding companies involved in areas like banking, insurance, real estate and securities.

lst.name: sentence
